name: Brand Story
description: 1-3 minute cinematic brand narrative short film. Emotional storytelling with a clear narrative arc, premium visuals, and professional audio. Ideal for brand launches, about-us pages, investor pitches, and social campaigns.

tasks: Identify the brand's origin story, mission, or core tension
Find the emotional hook — what makes people CARE
Choose narrative perspective: founder journey / customer transformation / mission-driven / behind-the-scenes
Define visual mood: warm & human / bold & innovative / serene & premium / raw & authentic

config.notes: This is storytelling, not advertising. Show, don't tell. Let visuals carry emotion while narration provides meaning.

config.style_notes: Cinematic composition. Use rule of thirds, natural lighting, depth of field. Mix wide establishing shots with intimate details. Every shot should evoke an emotion.
config.color_palette: derived from brand colors, muted and cinematic

config.notes: Generate a style frame first to lock the visual language. All subsequent keyframes must match. Use cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field, film grain optional.
Slow, intentional camera movement — dolly, crane, subtle parallax. This is not fast-paced content. Let shots breathe.

config.bgm_style: emotional, cinematic, piano or strings, building crescendo
config.notes: Music is a first-class element here, not background. Score should follow the emotional arc: quiet opening → building tension → emotional peak → resolved outro.

config.pacing: let shots breathe, 3-5s per shot minimum

config.notes: Brand stories need human review. Automated checks catch technical issues, but emotional resonance requires judgment.

config.variant_notes: 16:9 master for YouTube/website, 9:16 cut for social, 15s teaser cut for ads

narrative_arc.purpose: Establish the world. Wide shot + ambient sound. No narration yet.
Introduce the protagonist (founder/customer/community). Show their world.
The problem, the gap, the frustration. What's broken in the world?
The moment of insight, creation, or decision. The brand's reason for existing.
The journey — building, growing, overcoming. Montage energy.
The result — lives changed, problems solved, beauty created.
Where we're going. The bigger picture. Aspirational.
Brand mark + tagline. Let the emotion linger. Fade to black.

example_prompts: Use the "Brand Story" template for Patagonia-style outdoor brand 'TrailForge' — mission is making adventure gear from recycled ocean plastic.
Brand Story template: tell the story of our AI startup 'Lumina' — we help blind people navigate cities with audio AR.
Make a brand story for my coffee roastery 'Origin' — we source directly from farmers in Colombia and Ethiopia, paying 3x fair trade prices.
tips: Start with silence or ambient sound — don't rush into narration. Let the audience settle into the world.
Find the human story behind the brand — people connect with people, not products or mission statements
Use the 'show, don't tell' rule — if narration says 'we care about quality', the visual should SHOW quality, not just state it
Music makes or breaks brand stories — spend time on the score. It should have its own arc matching the narrative.
Generate a style frame first and approve it before creating all keyframes — visual consistency is everything in brand films
Keep it under 2 minutes for social, up to 3 minutes for website hero — anything longer loses casual viewers
